thread.title: DESHAN, PRESTON

author: DESHAN, PRESTON
title: DESHAN, PRESTON
text: I have purchased 4 automatic or super automatic coffee machines through the years and my recent experience with WholeLatteLove was undoubtedly my most pleasant. Their selection of machines and models is unexcelled and they carry a complete line of accessories and supplies. Their prices are competitive and their service outstanding. I will be doing business with them in the future.
